website_summaries.verdict: Protect your wallet and the environment with this two-sided dry erase board for daily lessons.
pros: Two-sided: a lined side for teaching language arts subjects and an unlined side for teaching math
Easy to hold on a table or lap for teaching
cons: Corners tend to damage easily, especially if dropped or wet

customer_reviews.title: Handy, sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So this is a basic, 9 x 12 dry erase board. Why do I love it? I started using this minutes after receiving it and have used it daily many times each day. No frame to come off or get caught on. Easy to tuck away and grab when I need it (I am an online math teacher, so being able to quickly work through a problem along with a student is great!). Sturdy, but light enough to do what I need. Erases cleanly with soft cloth/paper. Perfect for my needs. Haven't found any negatives as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: NJH51

customer_reviews.title: Great for technical college
customer_reviews.text: I'm an electrical engineering student, so many of my classes involve complex mathematical processes and diagrams. I bought this to streamline working on this type of material, and so far it has worked very well. The board is quite sturdy, and doesn't bend or scratch when placed in a tightly packed backpack. I like how this model doesn't have the plastic edge; I like having no bezel on boards like these as it looks better and doesn't connect extra dust and dry-erase residue. Cleans easy with a lens cloth, writes nicely without smearing or otherwise being difficult. I have nothing but good things to say, can't think of any downsides.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for artists looking for lap boards!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. It’s the perfect lap board for artists who like to have portable surfaces to work on. I use watercolors a lot and the surface is ideal for testing mixes, blending water-based markers, taking notes, etc... I was looking for a good lap board for a Danielle Donaldson workshop I was taking and this one did the trick for me. I didn’t want to order a pack of 10, 20 or more like is offered by other manufacturers. I just needed 1...and this was the right one. It is shiny white on one side and satiny gray on the other. Very well made and smooth edges.
customer_reviews.author: smilesoftexas

customer_reviews.title: MUCH higher quality than other whiteboards at the price
customer_reviews.text: Most bargain-priced small whiteboards are flimsy, just thin plastic backed with cardboard. They dent and bend too easily. This one seems to have masonite or some other backing that is much harder. Impressive. A holder for a marker would be a nice addition, but for the price, this is a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for; a simple small whiteboard for markers without the useless plastic frame on the edges. Fits perfectly on a college backpack, it's lightweight, has a smooth surface, and feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Angélica Ibáñez

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed - great quality!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened up the package, I was actually a little disappointed to see that it wasn't the type of dry erase board I was accustomed to (like with the plastic or metal frame). However, upon unwrapping it and trying it out, I realized it's actually perfect! It's super sturdy, has graphing lines on one side and is blank on the other, and you can write on it and clean it off with ease. Very good quality. It's exactly what I needed for my online proctored exams and couldn't be happier. And the price was right! Thank you so much. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PeachMarie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simple whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend, because he wants to work out quick coding problems on a portable white board while at a coffee shop or at home. It's smooth, sturdy, and has no extra "features" on it that make it inconvenient to use. Prior to buying this board, he used a board from Target that had a nonremovable plastic strap bolted into the board in order to keep a marker attached to it. But the bolt/plastic strap just got all over the place and wouldn't let the board lay flat. A+ for a small, simple, no-frills whiteboard.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great for children.
customer_reviews.text: This board is great. Great to use in church so kids can color on it and it keeps them entertained without rustling paper. Just erase and they can draw again. The size is small but not so small it doesn't have plenty of space to write on but it's not so large to overwhelm your lap. This erases cleanly and doesn't leave residue stains on the board. Very nice product
customer_reviews.author: Stacie S

customer_reviews.title: Thin, Cheap and Poorly Constructed
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and I was looking for a nice, solid mini whiteboard for Distance Learning. I ordered this one (a little more expensive) because the pictures and description made it look like a nice, thick, heavy-duty mini whiteboard. It is absolutely not. It is probably the thinnest whiteboard I have ever used and the corners are already starting to chip away from the edges. I purchased ones for my students that were cheaper, shipped faster, are far thicker and sturdier and included a marker. Definitely would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter’s virtual learning sessions. It’s a decent board and erases well. My only complaint is that after using it twice, one of the corners is already cracked and bent. She isn’t rough with it and only uses it to write her math problems and letters during her sessions, there is no other play with it during the day. I also wish it had a usable back to it. The back is gray and cannot be written on or erased. She will continue to use this, but I did have to purchase a double sided one that is a little thicker for school.
customer_reviews.author: Sjmama3

customer_reviews.title: good so far
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this piece and so far it is great. It cleans easily with just the wipe of a cloth. The product seems durable. It would be cool to get it a little larger with another row for measures or to make more narrow meeasures with the board rotated or the way it is--at any rate-options to fit more on there would be cool. also-i tried to buy fine tip markers but they really are not that fine-works ok with the configuration of the board as is though. I appreciate this piece as I can work through stuff without having to use up so much paper.
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not durable, damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: This came in a padded envelope that must have been dropped during transit. The corner of the whiteboard - the thin laminated white - had cracked off. its basically just a bit of thick cardboard with thin white laminate roll stuck on one side. the other side is grey so not even reversible. A fiddly child would just pick, pick, pick at the edges, or even chew on them and end up destroying the board themselves. Not at all durable. Seems good value until you see what it is. I can't rate it on cleaning and manoeuvrability as I didn't even take it fully out of the packet.
customer_reviews.author: mrs ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It's very very sturdy and lightweight and easy to erase (it's my second item I bought from this manufacturer, and I am very pleased)
customer_reviews.author: Hindy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy; Expect It To Survive Kindergarten
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a school-supplied board. It is very smooth and easy to write and erase on it. It is sturdy enough to survive the year. The school supplied my kindergartner with a very nice looking, but very flimsy white board. By the third week it was punctured and dog-eared. It has the alphabet printed on it, which I miss on this one. See
customer_reviews.author: Curious John

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I used this board for about 3 days before I had to look for another. For the price this board is a rip off. I only used this board on my desk and after 3 days it no longer lay flat. It also leaves smudge marks whenever you clean it. It feels very cheap compared to ScribbleDo boards I ordered afterwards. Even though they only come in a package of 6, I suggest buying that brand because they are very well made and they also come with erasers. This brand was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JayKruz_90

customer_reviews.title: Great little board to use for school.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 1st grader when her school supply list stated that she needed a dry erase board for her virtual learning class. The board is the perfect size for little hands to manipulate. It's big enough to practice writing her words and letters, but not so big that it is unwieldy. I also like that it has a blank side and a ruled side. The ruled side is perfect for helping her practice her handwriting while the blank side allows her to draw pictures. The only thing that might make this product a little better would be some type of frame to protect the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Burleigh Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandson that just entered into kindergarten virtually. The school provided a protective sheet cover that was very difficult to have him practice his letters and numbers. So I found this and am very happy with the quality and sturdiness of this lined dry erase board. It will help tremendously to help him during class when the teacher asks him to show them the letters and numbers he is asked to write. So thanks! I highly recommend it because he can practice over and over again and not have to waste lined paper in order for him to practice!
customer_reviews.author: Eskimo0722

customer_reviews.title: Great white board
customer_reviews.text: Great white board. Now that we are on "Lock down" here in CA, it happens to be extremely useful as my daughter does math online, she uses it as a scratch paper so instead of using a ton of paper she just erases and reuses. We are also having online Spanish class and as the teacher says "draw a person wearing shorts" in Spanish, the kids use the white boards and then erase them for the next one. Other than that, she loves it for making signs for her pretend "shops" or just for drawing a picture with the multicolored pens we bought. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Amy

customer_reviews.title: Decent white board
customer_reviews.text: I like buying white boards for my kids that do not have the plastic boarders and the cardboard backing, as those do not last a full school year for my kids. This white board fit the bill, and is thinner than the other brands I have bought before (Staples and Expo brands that look like this one). The only issue is a little piece of whiteboard already chipped off of one corner. Although the rest of it seems sturdy and it's still useable. I also filled a spray bottle with rubbing alcohol for cleaning the whiteboard and it cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 5

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality Dry Erase Board
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for our daughter to use during these remote learning times. The board is the perfect size for her day to day schooling, it is sturdy and appears that it will survive the torture that I am sure she will inflict on her younger siblings using this board as a weapon. I have no doubt we will need another one if this continues into next year but I am happy to say that if this item wasn't sturdy and well made that we would most likely be buying two or three of another brand so I highly recommend this item and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Mykola

customer_reviews.title: Best children's white board!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I had looked at Walmart, OfficeMax and Target for one of these and I had no luck at all. Then I turned to Amazon and came across this one and was super excited! I have a kindergarten and he needed a board with the primary lines for learning how to write properly within the lines. The best part is that this board also has the blank side for when his class plays games or when they draw pictures. The sturdiness of this board is MAGNIFICENT! Especially for a 5 year old I would definitely recommend this board to anyone that needs their children to learn how to write within the primary lines. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Distance Learning!
customer_reviews.text: When we went on distance learning, my son used a ton of paper working out math problems. My daughter used a small white board to work out the math problems. I really liked her idea! I bought 2 of these. The boards are really nice! They are using they them with their summer workbooks currently. I love the graph on the one side. It is gonna save soooo much paper in this house. The boards wipe completely clean and are the perfect size for at the table but big enough for my kids big writing. These will be great for the fall distance learning.
customer_reviews.author: Skiesshadedred

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old is a remote learner this year and needed a white board. This one is the perfect size for small hands and is light weight. It's easy for me to clean but not as easy for him - which is why I gave 4 stars for 'easy to clean'. If you just use a dry cloth to wipe away the ink, the ink smears all over. A pinch of pressure and a damp cloth seem to do the trick! I would recommend to anyone who needs a white board at a great price point, that is easy to maneuver. Would recommend to others and purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: NYMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lots of Applications
customer_reviews.text: The white board was purchased for my granddaughter to use for the upcoming school year - at home virtual learning. Her teacher likes to use the whiteboards during math lessons. Number sentences with answers can be written quickly on the boards and held up so the teacher can see if the children have understood the concept she/he is reviewing or teaching. They erase quickly. I also use the whiteboard in the car for long trips. We play Hangman or other word games so the time passes quicker for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school
customer_reviews.text: My 5th grader needed a white board for school. This is by far my favorite of what I've seen from other kids. I like that there's not "lip" or frame around the edges. Not only does this mean my son can maximize use of space, but it also makes it easier for him to use because he doesn't have to lift his wrist over a frame when he's writing. It is the perfect size for his desk or lap. I'm really glad I went with this instead of the options from one of the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best whiteboard out there
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is very sturdy it is not carton but wood. It sooo easy to clean there are streaks left behind especially with my small kids it remains clean as when i first got it. I recommend this for all moms it small enough for my 4 year old to put on her lap and easier for my 8yr old to hold while writting his sentences, i had to purchase another one, so i did. Thank you, it has been a little stressful with whiteboards that don't clean off as easy, with 3 kids in school it is amazing, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Monica De Los Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great for math practice
customer_reviews.text: This is a good board to use if you want to practice math, particularly graphing lines or functions. My son's algebra teacher this year wants the class to use personal white boards to limit the touching other surfaces, pens, etc. due to COVID. I saw this one and like the fact that one side is blank and the other has the grid for graphing. Should make life much easier for him. The board is light, but seems pretty sturdy. There is very little flex to the board at all.
customer_reviews.author: JJG

customer_reviews.title: Great product, really impressed with customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what you expect and want it to be. I've been happy to find that it cleans off really well with no residual marker showing. What I'm really impressed with is the company's customer service. The first board I ordered arrived with a small nick out of the back. We contacted their customer service and they got back to us right away. They immediately sent us a replacement board so that we didn't even have to go through the return process. Really impressed. I really enjoy working with American companies.
customer_reviews.author: sasquatchCR

customer_reviews.title: Great dry erase board!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for homeschooling/covid-schooling and I couldn't be happier! It has saved us so much paper, is very easy to wipe clean, doesn't stain, and holds up to a lot of use by a 7-year-old. We use the side with lines for handwriting practice, spelling, and writing sentences. We use the blank side for drawing, working out math problems, and so much more. It might be a little pricier than the boards you can get at a big box store, but the quality is much higher and this will last us many years.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids Would also work for office or regular home use.
customer_reviews.text: Since school is online (thanks covid) we needed a white board for our son's classes, to help not waste paper. Got this board and it is perfect for him. Cleans well and easy (not using a marker eraser at the moment and still cleans well), has plenty of space for his to write multiple answers and do his math drawings, it isn't bendy. I can see this working well for an office area and home (quick small messages or to-do lists)
customer_reviews.author: J1M_288

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  I expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is about as bare bones as you can get... why it would be $12 blows my mind. I expected something more premium in quality or materials. I figured it being more costly means it would be much higher quality than those you can get multi pack. Get more for your money by getting it elsewhere and get one that comes in a pack of 6 or 12 for the little bit extra. This thing should be half the price it is. I feel like I was swindled.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great for homeschooling, brainstorming, and doodling. Wipes clean great. Used Crayola Take Note Dry Wrase Markers and Expo. (Crayola is very wet and cleans effortlessly.) Board is not magnetic. Reverse side is blank; both sides usable. Doesn't seem like it will peel or lose its glossiness/writability anytime soon. Lightweight. Rounded edges. Bought this one for my Kindergartener and the grid one for my 4th grader.
customer_reviews.author: gie

customer_reviews.title: Less paper.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son’s school work at home. Was tired of loose papers everywhere LOL. Was very happy I saw this. Not only does it look like writing paper but, flip it over and it’s a plain whiteboard. My son Can practice his math problems on the plain side. I only gave this 4 stars because, the shipping package is not good. The 2 corners were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for School during Covid!
customer_reviews.text: During this time, school is online. I'm taking math and science classes. So as you can imagine, that's a lot of paper dedicated to working through problems for tests, where only the answer counts because the professor can't see the work. If we were taking an in-person test, showing my work and keeping it there is important. But in this case, it's a lot of wasted paper. So this was a perfect find. Exactly what I was looking for, an erasable scratch paper! I remembered these being pulled out in elementary school and thought I'd give it a try. It's easy to write on and erase. It will serve it's purpose perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: BGray6795

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, perfect for homeschooling. Support small family businesses!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! It's a basic dry erase board. Does the job. Very happy with quality. I would definitely purchase again. I also love the fact that Emma includes a personal note and that it is from a small family business! Love to support family businesses! We are homeschooling this year and love the fact that it is small enough to store, cleans up perfectly and it is a great, affordable price. Thank you Emma and family!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer1989

customer_reviews.title: Handy Great buy! Wipes easy! Doesn’t stain.
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Easier than other whiteboards that I’ve had!!! To wipe off that I noticed the markers kinda stain long term whether you wipe with dry or wet wipe. This one works so easy with an old sock. I use it for visual learners on zooms for my new teammates that I’m I’m training. Probably would work great with online learning or math problems pretty well. Small and easy to use like a clipboard 📋 very convenient to have handy!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia2tot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home learning!
customer_reviews.text: I am, like many parents, teaching my kids from home and bought these boards for my kids to practice their sight words. They came with a hand written note from the owner Emma. It's always great to support small businesses especially during this time!!! These are a perfect addition to at home learning and my kids immediately took them out and started drawing all over them. Excellent quality and will get used often!
customer_reviews.author: ChiMom

customer_reviews.title: Thin but priced right
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this board for remote school during quarantine. Although this is a thin board, it gets the job done. It arrived damaged, which isn’t a surprise given it was shipped in a bubble envelope only. The damage won’t interfere with use in this case and we need it immediately so not worth returning. I mention the damage only to signify how thin the board is.
customer_reviews.author: JDBrower

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cyber school and would be great for writing practice at home too!
customer_reviews.text: Our cyber school supply lists included white boards for use during live online lessons. These are PERFECT because they meet the basic requirement, are super lightweight, easy for our little kiddos to handle, provide a blank white side AND lined side for younger ones still learning to write...feel so very fortunate that something like this is even available! I'd recommend it even to families who are doing traditional schooling to help your kiddos who are learning to write, since they can practice over and over with the lines to quide them and not use up all your paper. Thank you, Emma!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is just one board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the handwriting lined board from Mint NY. The quality of this board is very good, however the seller or listing owner really needs to change everywhere that it says "boards" to be singular "board" since they only ship one. The hero image for the handwriting lined board shows two boards, and the word "boards" plural is in the title and descriptions so I thought I was getting two. That said, I'm still happy because the quality is good but this seems like a cheap tactic to get someone to buy your listing thinking they're getting a better deal than they are.
customer_reviews.author: H. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for a couple boards I have used for years, and could not find at the stores. I do photography, and even though there is digital metadata on each image, it helps me to physically write info periodically on a white board and take a photo of it,so when the images are transferred into the computer file, I have markers to help me find times and numbers in the hundreds of images on the computer. This board is the perfect size to fit into my photo equipment case, and is sturdy enough, and a quality product. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Photogeno

customer_reviews.title: Nice board for math homework!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my middle school daughter to do her math homework. This is really a nice product. I was expecting a thicker board but it actually works better because she can stick it in her back pack or trapper keeper. It is tlsturdy and portable. Both sides are functional, one graph, one whiteboard. I also bought another handwriting lined board for my Kindergartener, great products, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. It is great quality and I love that you can write on both the front and the back of the board. I got the one that had the tablet paper lines. I’ve used a few different brands of white board markers on both sides of the board and they wipe off with ease. Definitely recommend for parents or teachers of children that are young and age. Thank you for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M

customer_reviews.title: Great and helpful
customer_reviews.text: My kids needed something to help writing while at home during remote learning. They told me that in school they used a dry board. At home they use sheets. So I thought it was best to buy one to keep consistency with in person school days. They love it , my 6 year old is writing so much better and excited to use it everyday. My 4 year old is learning to write and likes using different color markers.
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE DUARTE

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Erases Well, Dual-Sided
customer_reviews.text: This small dry-erase board is wonderful! I bought two for my preschooler and elementary schooler to use during distance learning. It is lightweight and small enough for my kids to carry around on their own. I love that it also has a lined side for writing practice and a blank side for drawing. (Quality) dry-erase markers have no problem showing on the board, and it is easy to erase with just an eraser or a spritz of water with the eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Raindrops

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The core is made from a more sturdy wood chip board (like a classic old school clipboard) with a slick top sheet for writing on BOTH sides and quick erasing. I had been purchasing dollar store type boards. The ink from white board markers still stick if left on for a while, but it easily comes off with whiteboard cleaner. The ink doesn't leave a stain. We use the blank side for math problems and the other side has writing lines for practicing writing.
customer_reviews.author: Andie G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kindergartener who started school at home this year, it is well worth the price. I bought another cheap one that is all beaten up after a few uses because it’s cardboard underneath. This one is like clipboard material so it’s nice and sturdy. I love that it has two sides, both lined and blank. She can draw on one side and learn to write her letters and numbers on the other!
customer_reviews.author: NMHulett

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for online music classes
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to find this music staff dry erase board. I've just set up my home-based K-2 music curriculum, Come Jam With Me, on Podia, and this is just what I was looking for to introduce writing solfège syllables on a staff. It's a perfect size to be visible on the screen, and looks to be very well-made. I look forward to putting it to good use this fall! Thanks so much for making just what I needed! Lui Collins
customer_reviews.author: L. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Serves purpose
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase for what I wanted, to teach kids to write within the lines. Also has a plain back that they can draw on, which is nice. Only drawbacks are that it's pretty thin and I'm worried about my 4 year olds stepping on it or just being too rough and breaking it. It doesn't have any sort of border or drop protection. Also, doesn't come with any dry erase markers, but we luckily had some. Overall though, it serves it's purpose and I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: J. BALUCH

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We needed this dry erase board for my son's math class. Most sellers were offering packages of these dry erase boards, but we only needed one. I was so grateful to find this seller who was selling exactly what we needed...a 9" X 12" double-sided board with an XY axis grid on one side; dry-erase; and only ONE! It is sturdy and well-made. It also arrived several days earlier than stated. Great product and great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Mom at Heart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am currently taking college courses online, and they only allow you to go into tests with a white board and dry erase markers. The white board the school provided was very flimsy, and always retained markings no matter what I used to erase. I ordered this whiteboard in the hopes that it would be a workable size for school, more sturdy, and better quality overall. I am so happy with it! It’s the perfect size, not flimsy at all, stable, no raised border (which works for my needs) and cleans up great!
customer_reviews.author: Synn

customer_reviews.title: Quality but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Quality in terms of durability and easy wipe-down. But a suggestion to the seller in regard to the product’s description/title would be to state it is a BOARD and not boardS (plural). There’s no clear indication that this was just 1 board. I think that $10 is pricey for a single wipe board. I’m keeping it as I’m one of millions of parents required to homeschool at the moment so I know the board will be handy so as to avoid scrap paper for handwriting and math practice.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am homeschooling my daughter this year. this is exactly what we needed. We can easily do the work and erase CLEAN!!! That is the best part. I have had a bunch of whiteboards and they are never clean. THis one actually goes back to looking like a brand new board! It is just perfect and exactly what we needed. Practice letters on one side and math on the other. I would buys this in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lap Dry Erase Board
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6yo 1st grader to practice her alphabet (on the lined side) and draw pictures (on the blank side). She was super excited when it arrived and started writing right away. I like that it's small enough she can take it with her in the car or use while at the table or sitting in a chair. Exactly what I was looking for and for a good price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dry erase graph board
customer_reviews.text: My son just started 4th grade and is learning how to graph. Normally this would be done with paper and pencil in a classroom, but in the COVID virtual learning environment, paper and pencil were not sufficient, he needed something he could hold up to a monitor and show his teacher. This board is only slightly larger than an 8.5 x 11 piece of paper making it a very practical size for a student's desk. Plus, because it is dry erase, it can be reused with no waste. The opposite side of the graph is a blank dry erase board - again, very practical. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Heurkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for. The description tells you it's double-sided but it leads you to believe that both sides are lined. Not true. One side is lined and the other is blank. It's just what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: GIFT TO SOMEONE
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry that I cannot rate this as I did not purchase it for myself. I will rate it when I get feedback from the recipient. Days later - after gift was received, she said she was perfectly happy with the whiteboard and it comes in handy for many reasons. It arrived in perfect timing so all was satisfactory with the purchase, the seller, and delivery. Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: June C. Dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: This white board is perfect for Distance Learning with my 6 year old son. It's black on 1 side, we use that for math problems. It's lined on the other side with the preschool style lines for ELA and latticing site words. The teacher uses the boards to see what the kids are working and doing via video so my 6 year old has to hold it up to the camera throughout class time. The board is lightweight very easy to move around and hold up. It's strong but not thick which I love for storage reasons. It clears better than any lap board I've had. I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is really a small whiteboard for kids to practise writing on or for anyone who needs a handy white board. It's very good quality and my son uses it every single day to practise his letters and alphabets and simple words. It was really useful for us. Thank you for making these... plus its a small company which makes products in USA... yyiippee... #madeinUSA
customer_reviews.author: Solitaryreflection

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small whiteboard with no border to help identify what I photograph, while in the field. This serves my purpose exactly, wipes clean with no staining of the whiteboard, and is the right size to tuck into a notebook. in the past I've used a similar board when teaching citizenship to refugees, because it could easily fit in my binder, and worked as a lap board. Highly recommend, especially for the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busse

customer_reviews.title: Great board for practicing math from kindergarten to Alg 2.
customer_reviews.text: Love this dry erase board. I can use with all levels of math when I tutor. The students can graph on one side and work problems out on the other. The kids love using this versus paper and pencil all the time. Just a little thing picking their color of dry erase marker makes them more willing to do the work I ask them to do. Board is sturdy, great size for handling, and is very smooth and slick. I missed place my old board not was getting well used. This one cleans off so much nicer. It was time for a new board.
customer_reviews.author: A. R. Mast

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size for my daughter who is doing virtual learning this year in 3rd grade. It was required in the list of school supplies. Very sturdy, the only thing I didn’t like was no border but that’s just me! Doesn’t hamper the function of it at all. Easy to wipe off, doesn’t soak into the whiteboard like cheaper models do. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: strawberri

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: With schools kick off the year with digital learning, they have recommended with a white board for kids to write the answers during class to show their work. Walmart and other stores are sold out quick.... The ones available are too big for my first grader to hold in her hand. This one is just the right size, it is light weight but good quality, perfect choice for her school this year, and shipping was quick too.
customer_reviews.author: YUNYAN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boards, they are perfect for my students. The thing is that I have a whole class set, but a couple of them broke. So I needed to buy a couple to replace them but it seems like no one sells then individually, only in bulk. Then I saw your ad and was able to get a replacement for the two I lost. Thank you for making these available.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Durable and work as intended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my little nephew to help him write and learn. Also so my Gmom and I can communicate since covid and social distancing and strict nursing home guidelines make it hard to talk and for her to hear and understand spoken word. Works as intended and holds up nicely over repeated usage for the 8 boards I have bought and use.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Bucci Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, good for GRE scratch work
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic white board! Markers clean off of it easily and without a mark, even the red marker! I got it in order to take the GRE exam at home and it fit their criteria and allowed me to do my work. I love that there’s no extra frames or trimmings, just a good plain old white board with nothing to easily break. Thanks for this product!
customer_reviews.author: V-paw

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING !!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was great and actually came with a hand written note from the buyer !!! I absolutely love buying from small companies so it made our day to see we helped a small business! Shipping was over night and product is great !!! It’s sturdy! Easily cleaned and will help so much with teach a kindergartener during NTI! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great help for COVID window visits !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father who extremely hard of hearing ! He had hip replacement and is now in rehab and with COVID ( and mask covering lips ) only allowed window visits. I got this and a bigger one but this one is GREAT for the nurses to write words down he cannot hear . So this is just not a school item but health aid as well !
customer_reviews.author: Monalisa

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped us with working on graphing examples and practice while our daughter is doing her virtual learning. It is easy to use, easy to clean. I would buy this again in a heartbeat, we were using a regular whiteboard before and this was a great and inexpensive alternative to drawing our own lines and accidentally erasing them.
customer_reviews.author: madsam0an

customer_reviews.title: Get one for your university student. ;)
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The back is sealed so that the particleboard won't flake, which seems to be a problem for every other lap board sold on Amazon. It's very easy to clean, too; I've just been using tissues for quick erasing and a wet washcloth for cleaning. And I even bought off-brand dry-erase markers! Super great for homeworks with several questions per problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nate & Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my child!
customer_reviews.text: "Back to School" time is here, which means new supplies must be bought! This year, my oldest is needing a white board, and this one was perfect for what he requires. It's lightweight without being too fragile, at a price that's super affordable. School is just starting up, and as such, it hasn't seen much use yet. These ratings are all just from initial impressions, so if issues come up or it comes to he not as sturdy as initially thought, I will edit review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: J-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have a plastic border so don't bother buying from here you can find cheaper sellers
customer_reviews.text: Pictures can be so deceiving, but my eyes are not what they used to be either. I studied the photo and really thought this item had a plastic board which would make it easier to carry (by a 4 year old). It works alright but there's nothing to protect the edges. And I feel I over paid now because I saw this style with other sellers a few dollars cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Best white board.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to replace the one I bought at my local giant since for my daughter as she is doing remote/online learning due to the pandemic. She is in 1st grade and didn’t clean it well so it got stained so I bought this one to replace it. This white board is a great size since she writes in jumbo letters and doesn’t get stained with the marker even if it isn’t cleaned instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This board is perfect!! It arrived quickly— with a handwritten note included! It was affordable and exactly what we were looking for. My oldest uses the blank side to draw, study math facts, ect. and my youngest uses the lined side to practice her letters and numbers. It’s easy to clean, sturdy, perfect size, ect. AND we love supporting a small business!
customer_reviews.author: BeKindSunshine

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to write on and easy to clean. Bought it for my daughters distance learning. She's in Kindergarten and learning to write letters, words and sentences. So convenient. Definitely recommend. Please help small family businesses, especially in this pandemic. These school supplies are perfect essentials for distance learning.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: The writing lines are great for beginning writers.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the writing lines. They are bigger than college rule and seem a good size for kindergarten age children that are beginning to write. It was $11 and that seems a little high to me. I bought another brand and it came with a marker and was thicker but the lines were smaller. I'm glad I have it and we will definitely use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's a strong sturdy masonite board. The quality was better than I thought it would be. I've got cheaper boards that needs to be cleaned with Magic Erasers to get the residue off. This one is super shiny and erases cleanly with one go! Yay, I don't have especially clean this board in between my child's remote classes!
customer_reviews.author: W. Lee

customer_reviews.title: She loves it.  It’s very well made and we are doing great with writing.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. We started home schooling and she needs to write more. It’s a computer based program. Now she is writing all of her spelling words as she is reviewing and not complaining about it. 😁. She loves to use and erase. Much better than paper for her age and she is learning how to use the lines.
customer_reviews.author: Melbelle F

customer_reviews.title: Great for Distance Learning!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yo uses this for her distance learning classes. Her teacher asked all the students to have small white boards so they could hold their work up to the screen for her to see easily. It works great! My daughter really likes that it's small with no frame so it's easy to handle but it's still big enough to write and draw large letters and pictures. Like an erasable piece of paper! It's also sturdy enough to write on when it's on her desk OR on her lap, and being able to use it no matter how she's sitting is great because it's hard to sit still for a long day of virtual learning!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pagliarulo

customer_reviews.title: Best music whiteboard!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great whiteboard for quick music notation!!! Very sturdy and you can write on the front and back which is very nice, and the lines are spaced from each other enough for good notation. The ONLY issue I've had is there isn't really enough room in between staves for Roman numeral analysis or anything under the staff, but that's minor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheaper to buy the 5 pack by the same mfg on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased 2 of these, based on the reviews, for my daughters age 4 & 6. They are just the boards, no markers or erasers are included. After ordering I found a 5 pack of the exact same boards, by the same mfg, that also come with 5 erasers and 5 markers for $3.00 cheaper. So I returned these and ordered the 5 pack.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Item just delivered and already has a chip in one of the corners (see photo). This doesn’t affect its functionality but is annoying for a new item to arrived damaged. For the lack of quality and durability, it is overpriced. It should only be priced at half of what I actually paid. I guess home school supplies are in high demand, thus we are being overcharged.
customer_reviews.author: ES312

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old loves that she can practice her letters on one side and draw on the other! Erasing is the test, some boards don't erase well which is a bummer, BUT this is not the case with this board. Erasing is not a problem and we've tested multiple markers! Glad we got this and looks like it will last a long time. (Thanks Emma 😉)
customer_reviews.author: Mommy760

customer_reviews.title: Great for the At Home GRE
customer_reviews.text: Since the pandemic, the GRE, LSAT, and other testing are allowing some at-home testing options. In doing so, the proctors need the testers to use whiteboards rather than paper to ensure honest and fair testing online. I bought this whiteboard for that purpose and it is a great size, super easy to clean with a quick brush of a rag in between questions, and just overall exactly what was needed. Plus, it appears that this seller is a smaller family-run outfit, and I enjoy supporting businesses like that during this crazy time. Good luck, test takers!
customer_reviews.author: LRB

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for At Home Schooling
customer_reviews.text: A white board was on our list for home schooling equipment and everything we saw at the Office products places were too big, too unwieldy and not Kid Friendly. This is perfect. On one side we can work on letters, on the other math. Great small business company and like to support small businesses. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: D. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great Dry Erase Board - Perfect Size, Too!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dry erase board that I ordered specifically for a test that I have to take from home. This test requires test takers to use a white board to show their work, and this board is the perfect size. I have also found some other uses for this dry erase board, and I've been using it for tutoring students. I would definitely purchase more of these boards for my future classroom. They are sturdy and very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It is a "lap" white board but I used command strips to put it on the wall next to my computer. I like that it doesn't have a frame around it and that the corners are curved so no sharp 90 degrees that can get crunched if it were to fall. Just a simple, well made white board that I write my "To do's" on.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This white board is exactly what I needed for my first grader’s virtual learning. It’s a nice quality and very sturdy, but not too heavy or difficult for her to hold and move around. It stores easily in her magazine rack. I really like that it’s blank on one side and lined on the other! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Giancola

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: My kid takes online classes. When they write with paper and pencil, the teacher on the other side of the video call can't see the written letters. This product came in very handy to practice handwriting and also it is very easy for the teacher to see what the child is writing. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Virtual Schooling and Saving Paper
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a wipe-off board for school and this works perfectly. I love that it has two-sides, one with lines for writing and one that is blank for drawing. She uses this every day for first grade via Zoom and it has been great so far. She practices hand writing every day so this really helps save paper.
customer_reviews.author: Emily96

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed to work out math problems
customer_reviews.text: I love this graph dry erase board! My daughter is doing algebra and needs to write out a lot of graphs. A dry erase board accomplishes it with more ease than paper and pencil and is more fun. Its easier for me to help her because my eyesight isn't amazing and working with tiny squares on paper is difficult for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elevenofus

customer_reviews.title: Product Could be Improved
customer_reviews.text: I like that this board is easy to clean but it must have been dropped or bruised before reaching my home. When I opened the package, one corner was pushed in, ever so slightly, but when I removed the shrink wrap, a piece on that corner of the white board fell off. I’m afraid more of it will fall off if dropped. Given this board is marketed toward children to teach them to write, it seems it could have been made with a bumper guard along the edges to prevent this issue from occurring.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Great for homeschooling
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two boards, one with the grid and one with handwriting lines. Both have a blank usable surface on the other side. They arrived in good condition and work well for my kids’ homeschool lessons.
customer_reviews.author: ECM

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The film on this white board is of high quality. Dark markers erase without leaving residue or a shadow behind, which means the board has enough “gliding film” (I don’t know the technical term.) I’ve used other boards where the white film is almost porous and no matter how good the dry erase markers one uses, it leaves a residue/shadow behind. The broad also has enough weight to it so it doesn’t move around when writing on it. I Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alma A Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Great item with impeccable customer service as well.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our 1st grade kiddo in homeschooling. She practices writing her letters and words. We had a very small issue (NOT ONE that would stop us from reordering) and the owner of the company reached out to us and was EXTREMELY accommodating and had impeccable customer service skills. I would recommend this item to EVERYONE, for if there is a problem it is sure to fixed Pronto!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: My 4th grader uses this board nearly every day in class. As a Chinese immersion student, she is learning how to correctly formulate characters and the board is great as it allows her to easily erase, and try again until she gets it right. Love that it is two-sided so she can work free-form or within the lines and that it is so light-weight. Other boards we've tried in the past have been bulky and are almost pre-school in nature with wide borders and unnecessary border patterns that take working space away from the student whereas this board is truly designed for students.
customer_reviews.author: Network Janitor

customer_reviews.title: GRE at home approved
customer_reviews.text: This truly is such a wonderful whiteboard. It’s is the perfect size, slightly larger than a standard sheet of paper. The item arrived much earlier than I expected!! Literally within the next day or so. It also came with the sweetest note about the company being a small, family business. Which I am more than happy to support. There was also a small refrigerator magnet, sweet bonus. I am taking the GRE test, with their new at home version, and this whiteboard is approved for that. So if you don’t have a transparent paper protector this is your go to for any potential grad school students.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Okay, expected better quality/durability for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dented corner and the top layer quickly chipped off. Quality is par with something you’d find in the Target dollar area, really thin pressboard with the smooth whiteboard layer adhered to it. Definitely not worth $11, but do appreciate having two sides with lines on one side.
customer_reviews.author: thecapn

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment, and exactly as described. Since Covid (pre-school got cancelled) we have been home schooling our grand baby age 4 to get her ready for next year’s school year. This is exactly what we needed for her letters. Thank you for helping make her education a bit easier. (On us)
customer_reviews.author: rassccal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size & Weight!
customer_reviews.text: I am learning a language and I needed a small whiteboard to practice writing on. This is just perfect! It’s small & light enough to hold, but still big enough to get quite a bit of practice in before I need to erase. It cleans up super easily and seems to be great quality! I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: AJ'sMomTop Contributor: Pets
